I am a planetary scientist at Freie Universität Berlin, with a focus on Mars polar science and Saturn rings, using Citizen Science and complex data analytics, sprinkled with AI.  
In my spare time I like to spend time with my son, letting him slowly take over all the building of furniture from a well-known blue-yellow-branded furniture company. ;)
